segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a puddle, but she keeps polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s daydreaming or just really focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if she doesn’t turn it off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t heard the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she wakes up before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
